content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Dudhaiya

Written by Abhishek Dudhaiya. Raman Kumar. Ritesh Shah. Pooja Bhavoria. Manoj Muntashir

Cast Ajay Devgn (Squadron Leader Vijay Karnik). Sanjay Dutt (Indian Army Scout Ranchordas Pagi). Sonakshi Sinha (Sunderben Jetha Madharparya). Sharad Kelkar (Ram Karan ‘RK’ Nair). Nora Fatehi (Heena Rehman). Ammy Virk (Vikram Singh Baj Jethaaz). Pranitha (Usha Karnik (as Pranitha Subhash)). Mahesh Shetty (Vinod Karnik). Ihana Dhillon (Nimrat Kaur). Pawan Shankar (Mohammad Hussain OMANI. Pakistan Intelligence Chief). Zahid Ali (Brigadier Mukhtar Baig). Heroxicated Armaan (Armaan). Mandy Azrot (Navy Officer’s Wife). Rahuul Chwudhary (Virag Patel). Himanshu Dubgotra (Imran Zaidi). Shravani Goswami (Sunderben’s mother in law). Vaansh Goswami (Colonel Taimur). Ahtesham Azad Khan (Major Waqar sheikh). Mohammad Salman Khan (Aeroplane pilot). Monazir Khan (Anurag Tripathy). Rahul Khanna (Ardali). Rocky Mahajan (Iqbal Siddique). Vishwas Nagda (Lakhan). Vaibhav Palhade (Bablu). Jay Patel (Srinivasan Naidu).Vinod Pund. Singh Rajni (Hira Ben). Pradeep Rajput (Rohit). Divya Ratan (Pakistani army officer). Hitesh rathod (Rohitt (voice) (as Hitesh Rathod Viratian)). Siddharth Sanger (Village sarpanch).Anirudha Singh. Aparajit Singh (Nissar khan). Hansa Singh (ghanghordevi). Yash Ajay Singh (Major Jasbir Sodhi). Rahul Tarar (Ravi). Karan Singh Thakur (Gul Mohammed batt.). Taneja Ujjwal (Vijay Shankar). Yashika Singh Yadav (Rama Ben)

Languages Hindi

Producers Syed Zaid Ali. Vinod Bhanushali. Ashok Bhushan. Shiv Chanana. Aditya Chowksey. Abhishek Dudhaiya. Vishal Khanna. Ginny Khanuja. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Bunny Sanghavi. Sunil Sharma. Vajir Singh. Saurabh Sinha

Production Ajay Devgn Ffilm. Select Media Holdings- Moving Picture. T-Series Film
